Package com.mashery.trafficmanager.cache

The package contains classes which provide APIs to the custom processors to add/remove/update entries in the cache.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Cache
    Cache API which allows extensions to store and retrieve data from cache.
    CacheService
    Provides a handle to the cache service which allows retrieval of different caches
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CacheException
    Cache exception is thrown when the data storage or retrieval from cache fails

Package com.mashery.trafficmanager.cache Description

The package contains classes which provide APIs to the custom processors to add/remove/update entries in the cache.
